Attacks.Name: Air Slash
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is pushed away Short range. After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Attacks.Name: Fire Blast
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Attacks.Name: Dragon Breath
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character gains the Stagger special condition.

Attacks.Name: Dragon Claw
Attacks.Effect: This attack has a piercing effect. If a critical and a wild are rolled, ignore the target's defense dice.

Superpowers.Name: Wings of Fire
Superpowers.Effect: Charizard gains Flight and can ignore terrain and characters when moving until the end of the turn.

Superpowers.Name: Flame Tail Sweep
Superpowers.Effect: Perform a sweeping attack with Range 2. Any character hit by this attack suffers 1 damage and gains the Incinerate special condition.

Attacks.Name: Heat Wave
Attacks.Effect: This attack targets all characters within Range 2 of the point of impact. If a wild is rolled, characters hit by this attack suffer the Burn special condition.
